I offer expert data analysis and programming services tailored to the realm of clinical pharmacology programming, specifically CDISC, popPK, PK/PD etc. dataset creation, as well as the development of insightful tables, listings, and figures. I am committed to providing comprehensive solutions to meet your analytical needs.

Additionally, I also provide consulting expertise in leveraging open source software within the pharmaceutical domain. I am dedicated to empowering clients with the tools and knowledge needed to harness the full potential of open source technologies, fostering innovation and efficiency in drug development.

Whether you require in-depth data analysis, expert consultation, or guidance on open source software utilization, I am here to support you every step of the way. For more information contact me at [HigginsDataSolutions\@gmail.com](mailto:higginsdatasolutions@gmail.com)
